data.name: Approach.Text
data.value: Describe the innovation of your initiative or Solution

data.name: ApproachDesc.Text
data.value:
Showcase the uniqueness of your initiative or Solution. Highlight the characteristics that can make it replicable in other contexts.
Try to address these questions as you describe the initiative or Solution:
  • Are you highlighting the innovation and unique character of your initiative?
  • The methodology in which your initiative or Solution is based on is clearly explained?
  • Is your initiative or Solution related with the problem?
  • Is the initiative or Solution actionable, practical?
  • Is the initiative or Solution replicable, scalable?

data.name: AutocompleteMessage.Text
data.value: Choose an existing organization or enter the name of a new one.

data.name: AvailableResourcesDesc.Text
data.value: Please tick all resources that are readily available for the implementation of your Solution, or for the transfer of knowledge. This really enhances the description and shows the effort undertaken to develop resources for scale and replication.

data.name: BeneficiariesDesc.Text
data.value: Identify the beneficiary of your initiative or Solution.

data.name: BlockAdditionalInformationDesc.Text
data.value: More specific information about the Solution

data.name: BlockBenefitsDesc.Text
data.value: Describe qualitatively and quantitatively the impact of your initiative or Solution Emphasize the reach of this impact and how it is sustainable over time.

data.name: BlockDetailsDesc.Text
data.value: Describe how your initiative or Solution is implemented or could be replicated, and provide information of the costs and time.

data.name: BlockDurationDetailsDesc.Text
data.value: sdf sd ff dsfdsfsdfsd f sdf sdf sdfsdf sdf sdf sdf sdfsd ds fsd

data.name: BlockEvidencesDesc.Text
data.value: Has your initiative or Solution been previously tested in the field? Where? For how long? Do you have more information and documents? Share them here.

data.name: BlockFinishDesc.Text
data.value: A peek at how NEXSO displays your initiative or Solution before you hit Send

data.name: BlockInnovationDesc.Text
data.value: This is the key section! Explain how your initiative or Solution is innovative and unique; and how it can be replicated in other places. Explain how your initiative has made a difference in addressing the problem described.

data.name: BlockOrganizationBasicDetailsDesc.Text
data.value: Organization information. Create a new one or search for an existing one.

data.name: BlockProblemDesc.Text
data.value: Describe the specific problem that your initiative or Solution seeks to address. It should be a very specific problem, not a macro global issue like "climate change"or "poverty".

data.name: ChallengeDesc.Text
data.value:
Try to address these questions as you describe the problem:
  • What is the current context of the problem and the current situation of the beneficiaries that your initiative or Solution seeks to address? Situation of the beneficiary that you try to support with this initiative or Solution?
  • What is the specific problem that the beneficiaries are facing?
  • What causes this problem you are describing?
  • What is the size or magnitude of this problem? We recommend to include numbers.
  • Who are the affected people from this problem?

data.name: chkPublicationApproval.Text
data.value: I accept my Solution to be published in <a href="home.aspx" target="_blank"> nexso.org. </ a>

data.name: chkPublicationApprovalCustom.Text
data.value: I want my Solution to be published on nexso.org after completing the selection process by the Japan Special Fund Poverty Reduction Program (JPO). Only the information posted in my Solution will be published. Information related with the Expression of Interest and its annexes will not be visible to the public.

data.name: ConfirmationDelete.Text
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete this Solution?

data.name: CostDesc.Text
data.value: In this section provide an estimated budget for the implementation or replication of your initiative or Solution.

data.name: CostDetailsDesc.Text
data.value:
Use this space to describe additional cost considerations
Keep in mind other cost factors including travel, licensing fees, legal work, hosting and other online services for web projects, and materials.

data.name: DeliveryFormatDesc.Text
data.value: Please select the type that best describes your initiative or Solution.

data.name: DurationDetailsDesc.Text
data.value: Provide more information of the time it will require to implement your initiative or Solution.

data.name: ImplementationDetailsDesc.Text
data.value: Briefly describe the sequence of activities and details needed for the implementation or replication of your initiative or Solution. This information is very important for potential partner or adopter can understand what is required and can associate the costs and time needed for the implementation.

data.name: lbHeader.Text
data.value:
Thank you!

You have been automatically entered into the current NEXSO challenge. 

We will be in touch if your entry is selected by our judging panel.

What to do next

  • View more details
  • View Solution
  • Explore solutions
  • What is NEXSO?

data.name: lblMessage.Text
data.value:
Sorry, you're too late.

This challenge is now closed.

data.name: LocationDesc.Text
data.value: Locate the countries where your initiative or Solution has been implemented/replicated . Select all those that apply. If you add an incorrect country delete by clicking on the “X”at the country box.

data.name: LongDescriptionDesc.Text
data.value:
Here's an extra opportunity for you to pitch your Solution!
Use this additional space to share any additional information you have about your Solution. Get into more details here, or elaborate on a particular area. You might use this section to add more history of your Solution or to demonstrate credentials relevant to potential adopters. Please do not repeat yourself here.

data.name: MailTemplateNewSolution.Text
data.value:
{SOLUTION:Title}
Congratulations, {USER:FirstName}. We see you started a new application in NEXSO. Here's a short guide to show you everything you need to complete in order to see your initiative submitted.
Everything You Need To Get Your Initiative Submitted Successfully
1. Start Here
The title, the value proposition, the public entity.
2. Problem
Describe the specific problem that your initiative seeks to address.
3. Innovation
Demonstrate how your initiative is innovative and unique.
4. Impact
Describe qualitatively and quantitatively the impact of your initiative.
5. Implementation
Describe how your initiative is implemented or could be replicated.
6. Evidence
Additional information regarding your initiative.
7. Finish
Submit your initiative.
Edit your initiative
For further support on how to submit your application please visit our help page.
Forgot your password? Reset.
Inter-American Development Bank
Multilateral Investment Fund
1300 New York Ave NW, Washington, DC 20577, USA

data.name: MailTemplateNewSolutionSubject.Text
data.value: {USER:FirstName} Make sure you turn your draft into a submitted Initiative!

data.name: MailTemplatePublishedSolution.Text
data.value:
Your Initiative has been sumitted!
View my Initiative
Forgot your password? Reset.
Inter-American Development Bank
Multilateral Investment Fund
1300 New York Ave NW, Washington, DC 20577, USA

data.name: MailTemplatePublishedSolutionSubject.Text
data.value: {USER:FirstName}, Congratulations Your Initiative has been submitted successfully!

data.name: MaxLengthExceeded.Text
data.value: You have exceeded the maximum characters.

data.name: OrganizationAttachedDesc.Text
data.value: Write the name of your government or public entity to register it.

data.name: ProjectDurationDesc.Text
data.value: Indicate how long would it take to implement your initiative or Solution

data.name: Results.Text
data.value: Impact of your Initiative or solution

data.name: ResultsDesc.Text
data.value:
Try to answer these questions as you describe the impact of your initiative or Solution:
  • How do you quantify (using numbers) the impact of your initiative or Solution?
  • What is the potential scale or dimension of your initiative or Solution?
  • What is your sustainability model?
  • Have you included figures to support the impact description and show evidence of the success of your initiative or Solution?

data.name: revtxtCost.Text
data.value: Please type an integer or decimal type number. Ex: 1,352,365.36 or 1352365.36

data.name: rfvRadAutoCompleteBox1.Text
data.value: Please select or type an organization

data.name: rfvtxtAvailableResources.Text
data.value: Please select up to 3 resources. You must select at least one

data.name: rfvtxtBeneficiaries.Text
data.value: Please select up to 3 beneficiaries. You must select at least one

data.name: rfvtxtDeliveryFormat.Text
data.value: Please select up to 3 types of Solution. You must select at least one.

data.name: rfvtxtTheme.Text
data.value: Please select up to 3 themes. You must select at least one

data.name: ShortDescriptionDesc.Text
data.value: Pitch your initiative or Solution in a few words. Use this space to entice the reader. Provide details that complement the name. Convince the reader with a clear and concise message about the value that your initiative brings to the population of your entity. Don’t need to repeat the name, as these two items will always be shown together. Example: (Solution Name) Colima Model; (Value Proposition) Integral and Technological Strategy to Safeguard Peace in Colima.

data.name: Step0ShortMessage.Text
data.value: All Solutions must have a name & an organization

data.name: Step3ShortMessage.Text
data.value: Every Solution benefits to some one.

data.name: Step4ShortMessage.Text
data.value: Add useful tags to your Solution

data.name: SubmissionTitleDesc.Text
data.value: A great name is short, crisp, and easily understood. Try limiting the name to 8 words or less. Make your initiative or Solution stand out with a memorable name.

data.name: SupportDocumentsDesc.Text
data.value: Upload documents, such as testimonials, press releases, recommendations, references, certifications, recognitions, etc, that may offer additional evidence of effectiveness and credibility of your initiative or Solution.

data.name: TermsAcceptMessage.Text
data.value: I understand that in order to have my submission listed in NEXSO I must meet the Submission Guidelines and I must meet eligibility requirements.

data.name: ThemeDesc.Text
data.value: Select the themes related to the problem that your initiative or Solution seeks to address

data.name: Verification.Text
data.value: Thank you for verifying your account. You may now proceed to make a submmision.
